MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G52 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Hardridge road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.28pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required to locate and repair an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:41PM on Sunday 21 February 2021.
